bibl.title: Civic Life in Fourth-Century Trimithis. Two Ostraka from the 2004 Excavations.
bibl.note: Excavations at Amheida sponsored by Columbia University as part of the Dakhleh Oasis Project. 105 ostraka were found in a house (first half of the fourth century). - O. Trim. Inv. 23. Letter mentioning a liturgical appointment. - O. Trim. Inv. 22. Note about a liturgical nomination (?).
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S. and Giovanni R. RUFFINI, Civic Life in Fourth-Century Trimithis. Two Ostraka from the 2004 Excavations.

Excavations at Amheida sponsored by Columbia University as part of the Dakhleh Oasis Project. 105 ostraka were found in a house (first half of the fourth century). - O. Trim. Inv. 23. Letter mentioning a liturgical appointment. - O. Trim. Inv. 22. Note about a liturgical nomination (?).
